code: @Override protected void doExecute(Task task, final GetRoleMappingsRequest request, final ActionListener<GetRoleMappingsResponse> listener) {     final Set<String> names.     if (request.getNames() == null || request.getNames().length == 0) {         names = null.     } else {         names = new HashSet<>(Arrays.asList(request.getNames())).     }     this.roleMappingStore.getRoleMappings(names, ActionListener.wrap(mappings -> {         ExpressionRoleMapping[] array = mappings.toArray(new ExpressionRoleMapping[mappings.size()]).         listener.onResponse(new GetRoleMappingsResponse(array)).     }, listener::onFailure)). }
